ranked_diseases.explanation: Macular dystrophy characterized by cystoid changes; aligns with reduced visual acuity and history of similar presentation in reference cases.
Rare condition featuring macular changes and reduced visual acuity; though less common, phenotypic match exists but lacks full set of features seen in reference cases.
Stargardt disease often presents with macular dystrophy and visual acuity loss; however, less likely due to lack of additional Stargardt-specific features in this case.
